name: Sandy's Circus Adventure
overview: Sandy's Circus Adventure is a children's title about a friendly sea lion called Sandy. Sandy is lost in the circus and together with the player she will explore it. Sandy can have fun with the clowns, be launched out of a giant cannon, disappear inside a magician's hat, juggle and much more circus related activities. Every activity is accompanied with cartoon animations and digital music and sound effects. Furthermore there are some more active and creative activities such as color drawings, creating short animations and creating clowns faces by making combinations of facial features.
